Notes.Text:
catdoc was updated to version 0.95 to fix the following issues:

* Fix various issues found during fuzzing which may lead to an
  application crash or have unspecified further impact when
  the user is tricked into opening specially crafted files
  (boo#919228)
* Replace charset tables with new ones, published by Unicode
  Consortium with more permissive license
* Fix lot of segfaults on incorrect or corrupted data
Notes.Title: Details
